snippet: Acting on a suggestion Faulkner once made, the Folio Society is publishing “The Sound and the Fury” with 14 colors of ink.
abstract: Randy Boyagoda essay notes that the Folio Society will publish William Faulkner's masterpiece The Sound and the Fury with the text appearing in 14 colors of ink, taking heed of an idea the author himself had about how to make the novel's densest passages more accessible.
lead_paragraph: Acting on a suggestion Faulkner once made, the Folio Society is publishing “The Sound and the Fury” with 14 colors of ink.

headline.seo: ‘The Sound and the Fury’ in 14 Colors
